TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit KeyboardNavigation extends System.Object

summary.span: 在可获得焦点的对象之间提供逻辑和方向导航。

span.span: Provides logical and directional navigation between focusable objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当按下某个导航键时， 类负责实现默认键盘焦点导航。The class is responsible for implementing default keyboard focus navigation when one of the navigation keys is pressed. 导航键包括： Tab、Shift + Tab、Ctrl + Tab、Ctrl + Shift + Tab、向上键、向下键、向左键和右箭头项。The navigation keys are: Tab, Shift+Tab, Ctrl+Tab, Ctrl+Shift+Tab, UpArrow, DownArrow, LeftArrow, and RightArrow keys. 逻辑导航的一个示例是使用 tab 键移动焦点。An example of logical navigation is using the tab key to move focus. 方向导航示例使用箭头键移动焦点。An example of directional navigation is using the arrow keys to move focus. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，其中包含多个 对象。The following example creates a with a number of objects. 附加属性设置为 上的 。The attached property is set to on the . 这意味着，在 中使用 tab 键更改焦点时，焦点将从每个元素移动，当到达最后一个元素时，焦点将返回到第一个元素。This means that when focus is changed using the tab key within the , focus will move from each element and when the last element is reached focus will return to the first element. [!code-xaml[MarkupSnippets#MarkupKeyboardNavigationTabNavigationXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#markupkeyboardnavigationtabnavigationxaml)] [!code-csharp[MarkupSnippets#MarkupKeyboardNavigationTabNavigationCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#markupkeyboardnavigationtabnavigationcode)] [!code-vb[MarkupSnippets#MarkupKeyboardNavigationTabNavigationCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#markupkeyboardnavigationtabnavigationcode)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否接受回车符。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Return character is accepted by a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 获取设置此属性所在元素的子级的逻辑控件 Tab 键导航行为或对该行为进行设置。

span.span: Gets or sets the logical control tab navigation behavior for the children of the element that this property is set on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定当发生控件选项卡导航时，容器移动焦点的方式。This property specifies how the container will move the focus when control tab navigation occurs. 通过使用 CTRL + TAB 键组合来调用控件选项卡导航。Control tab navigation is invoked by using the CTRL+TAB key combination. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

Public Shared ReadOnly ControlTabNavigationProperty As DependencyProperty

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 获取设置此属性所在元素的子级的方向导航行为或对该行为进行设置。

span.span: Gets or sets the directional navigation behavior for the children of the element that this property is set on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用箭头键调用方向导航。Directional navigation is invoked by using the arrow keys. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|
